quest.name: Crazy Like the Pox
journal:
 Quest Sync
Duzal Meyean the Steady seeks a skilled Disciple of the Hand to assist his team of crafts...birds in the creation of intricate components.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 15 and above.

Duzal Meyean has asked you to synthesize components for the system of speaking tubes to be installed on the Dezul Qualan. Proper equipment to craft these items, however, is only found at the Diamond Forge in Revenant's Toll. Speak with forgewife Fyrbryda about receiving permission to utilize the facilities.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

Fyrbryda's rules for the forge are simple: one, all materials brought inside must be inspected for contraband, and two, if anyone wishes to make use of the facilities, they must first provide a generous contribution to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. Currently, the guild is in short supply of tangle skippers─a rare variety of air-breathing fish from which medicine for the pox is brewed. Travel west to the Tangle and catch two skippers using moth pupae.
You have caught two tangle skippers. Return them to Fyrbryda before the heat sees them grow ripe. Also, do not forget to submit the speaking tube component materials to the forgewife for inspection.

Fyrbryda has granted you access to the Diamond Forge's crafting facilities. Use the materials given to you by Duzal Meyean and inspected by Fyrbryda to synthesize a high-quality speaking tube component. Once completed, return to Ehcatl with the item.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Specialization wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Fyrbryda.

You have delivered the speaking tube component to Duzal Meyean. The veteran is taken aback by the obvious effort put into crafting the complex piece and expresses his desire to work with you once again in the future.
objectives: Speak with Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll.
As a fisher, catch tangle skippers in the Tangle.
Present the speaking tube component materials and the tangle skippers to Fyrbryda.
Synthesize a speaking tube component Deliver the speaking tube component to Duzal Meyean the Steady.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Caw! Skilled hands, I seek. Feathered, featherless, I care not. My brethren, I love, but all talons, they are. Grace, they have not. Perfection, they cannot achieve.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's speaking tubes, we are. If tubes not perfect, warp, voices will. Unheard, orders will be. Lost, lives will be. Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's speaking tubes, we are. If tubing not treated, rust in firmament mists, it will. Unheard, orders will be. Lost, lives will be. Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's speaking tubes, we are. If tubes not padded, cluttered, voices will become. Unheard, orders will be. Lost, lives will be. Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Featherless, you may be, but privileged, you are. Where shunned, an Ixal is, welcome are the daughterssons of man─welcome to use gifts of art and knowledge.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. The gifts of art, she tends. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw caw!

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: You've the look of business about you, so I won't waste your time mincing words. My rules here are simple. Follow them, and you are free to use the facilities for as long as you need.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Rule one─aught that passes through those doors must be inspected. I will have no contraband within my walls. Period. Rule two─you make a contribution of my choice to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. No questions asked. No exceptions.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: If that suits you, journey to the Tangle and use moth pupae to catch us two tangle skippers. The gall from their bellies is known to stave off the pox, and a recent outbreak has tapped the hamlet's supply.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: If it doesn't, you can leave, and let the screams of suffering children haunt your nightmares for eternity.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Journey to the Tangle and use moth pupae to catch two tangle skippers. Do this, and the facilities are yours to use.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Quick with you now, before the pox claims another innocent child's life.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Hm... Not as large as I had hoped, but these skippers will have to suffice. As for your materials...though obviously of questionable origin, I have found naught the guild has deemed forbidden. Proceed, then.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: If you require more time or materials, do not hesitate to ask, for today I am in your debt. I did not mention it before, but the skipper gall you brought today, it will save the lives of many...including my sick niece.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: I suppose this is farewell. If aught should happen to your work while on the road, do not hesitate to return here for additional materials, for this day I am in your debt. You see, I have just received word that the skipper gall you acquired...it has helped see my niece back from the brink of death.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Caw! Think me the fool, do my brethren. Expect perfection from featherless one, you cannot, they say. Make me look the fool, you must not, or make you look the corpse, I shall. Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Hah! Clumsy buzzard brethren! Quick to look down upon featherless one, you are. Yet behold! Perfect, herhis work is. If into passing my inspection, more care was placed than into passing wind, hands of featherless one, we would not have to borrow! Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Friend... Make me look the fool, you did not. Yet a fool would I be, should I not again seek your aid. Hear from me soon, you shall. Until that time, caw!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To complete this quest, you will need to change your class to fisher by equipping a fishing rod.
